title: AdvancedAchievements 应用
author: 幽冥冥灬
txt_content:
我服务器有个成就，是合成木制方块指定个数就能完成的成就：

  wood_stairs|wooden_door|wood_plate|wood_double_step|wood_step|spruce_wood_stairs|birch_wood_stairs|jungle_wood_stairs|wood_button|wood_sword|wood_spade|wood_pickaxe|wood_axe|wood_hoe|wood_door:
    10:      
      Goal: '&o制作 10 件木制物品/武器/装备'
      Message: 制作 10 件木制物品/武器/装备!
      Name: 木制工艺-I
      DisplayName: 木制工艺 - I
      Reward:
        Money: 10
        Experience: 10复制代码

然后这样写在后台报错：

[10:17:33] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 2014/ERROR]: [AdvancedAchievements] Database write error while batching statistic updates:
org.h2.jdbc.JdbcBatchUpdateException: Value too long for column """item"" VARCHAR(191) NOT NULL": "'wood_stairs|wooden_door|wood_plate|wood_double_step|wood_step|spruce_wood_stairs|birch_wood_stairs|jungle_wood_stairs|wood_butt... (192)"; SQL statement:
REPLACE INTO crafts VALUES ('69d1fd73-56db-3638-bec6-5fc041d68695', 'wood_stairs|wooden_door|wood_plate|wood_double_step|wood_step|spruce_wood_stairs|birch_wood_stairs|jungle_wood_stairs|wood_button|wood_sword|wood_spade|wood_pickaxe|wood_axe|wood_hoe|wood_door', 1) [22001-197]
        at org.h2.jdbc.JdbcStatement.executeBatch(JdbcStatement.java:792) ~[?:?]
        at com.hm.achievement.db.AsyncCachedRequestsSender.lambda$sendBatchedRequests$0(AsyncCachedRequestsSender.java:78) ~[?:?]
        at com.hm.achievement.db.SQLWriteOperation.attemptWrites(SQLWriteOperation.java:45) ~[?:?]
        at com.hm.achievement.db.AsyncCachedRequestsSender.sendBatchedRequests(AsyncCachedRequestsSender.java:83) ~[?:?]
        at com.hm.achievement.db.AsyncCachedRequestsSender.run(AsyncCachedRequestsSender.java:51) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:64) ~[PaperSpigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1618]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:52) ~[PaperSpigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1618]
        at com.destroystokyo.paper.ServerSchedulerReportingWrapper.run(ServerSchedulerReportingWrapper.java:22) ~[PaperSpigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Paper-1618]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_241]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_241]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_241]复制代码

而成就的填写我是按照 Wiki 上给的格式：

3. How can I track multiple types for categories with sub-categories (Places, Kills, TargetsShot, Breaks, Crafts, Breeding, PlayerCommands)?
Separate the different types using |. For instance:

Kills:
  zombie|pig_zombie|zombie_horse|zombie_villager:
    1:
      Message: The first time you killed any kind of zombie!
      DisplayName: The Walking Dead
      Name: kills_1_any_zombie

按理说应该没什么问题啊emm...

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
...
太长了

删几个物品吧

你加的
wood_stairs|wooden_door|wood_plate|wood_double_step|wood_step|spruce_wood_stairs|birch_wood_stairs|jungle_wood_stairs|wood_button|wood_sword|wood_spade|wood_pickaxe|wood_axe|wood_hoe|wood_door复制代码
太长了
超过了数据库里面预设的范围
适当删几个物品吧

replies.author: 幽冥冥灬
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-5-9 10:35
...
太长了
真就 too long了233，或者说有没有其他的解决办法

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
you＿ming 发表于 2020-5-9 10:36
真就 too long了233，或者说有没有其他的解决办法
应该是没有办法的
这个值在插件里面被写死了

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-5-9 10:37
应该是没有办法的
这个值在插件里面被写死了
可能作者也没想到有人会搞这么个成就写这么多物品进去23333
改的话你可以把 装备分一类 物品分一类这样 变成两个成就应该就行
